category: Key Phrases - Describe where you work
Radio: Enjoying Work - Late Nights with Lin
word: Salut, je m'appelle Léo. Tous les jours j'utilise mon ordinateur.
meaning: Hello, my name is Léo. Every day I use my computer.

category: Radio: Enjoying Work - Late Nights with Lin
Radio: Enjoying Work - Late Nights with Lin
word: J’ecris des messages sur mon ordinateur.
meaning: I write messages on my computer.

category: Radio: Enjoying Work - Late Nights with Lin
word: Aussi j'utilise mon portable pour envoyer des messages.
meaning: Also, I use my cell phone to send messages.

category: Radio: Enjoying Work - Late Nights with Lin
meaning: I like working with my colleagues.

category: Radio: Messaging Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
meaning: Hello, Louis. Are you writing a message?

category: Radio: Messaging Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Bonjour, Léo. Oui j'écris un message sur mon portable.
meaning: Hello, Léo. Yes, I am writing a message on my mobile phone.

category: Radio: Messaging Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
Radio: Messaging Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, je travaille à la maison aujourd'hui.
meaning: Yes, I am working from home today.

category: Radio: Messaging Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
Radio: Messaging Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Super! Tu as mon numéro de portable?
meaning: Great! Do you have my cell phone number?

category: Radio: Messaging Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, je l'ai. À bientôt, Louis.
meaning: Yes, I have it. See you soon, Louis.

category: Radio: Unremarkable Desk - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Louis. Voici mon bureau.
meaning: Hello, my name is Louis. Here is my office.

category: Radio: Unremarkable Desk - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
Radio: Unremarkable Desk - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: J'utilise le téléphone sur mon bureau.
meaning: I use the phone on my desk.

category: Radio: Unremarkable Desk - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
word: Il y a aussi un ordinateur.

category: Radio: Unremarkable Desk - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
meaning: I write a lot with my pen.

category: Radio: Unremarkable Desk - Oscar’s Antique Roadshow
